title: Crime Alert 05.22.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.22.19
description:
A hit-and-run sends a 7-year-old to the hospital. Colorado state troopers find more that 170 pounds of marijuana in the back of a U-Haul during a routine traffic stop. 51 people arrested in a series of drug raids in Connecticut.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
